Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a two-run home run in the first inning
Weston Wilson drove in the tiebreaking run with an infield single in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos commented on the apology from Tampa Bay manager Kevin Cash for the intentional hit-by-pitch incident the previous night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kyle Schwarber was scratched from the lineup due to discomfort in his left elbow
Others: Zack Wheeler struck out nine batters over six innings to earn the win
Carlos Estevez pitched a scoreless ninth for his 25th save
